display.title: Acquire: techreborn:matter_fabricator
description: Requires Lapotronic Energy Orb and Industrial Machine Frame quests.
Used to produce UU-Matter which in turn can be used to craft various vanilla items.
Both Scrap and Scrap Boxes can be used in the Matter Fabricator.
The first one will give you 2% on the progress bar for producing a single piece of UU-Matter which means that to produce 1x UU-Matter, you will need 50x Scrap.

subtitle.text: Requires Lapotronic Energy Orb and Industrial Machine Frame quests.
